description:
The name matching is wrong in destroy_container
https://github.com/openstack/nova/blob/master/nova/virt/disk.py#L194

In this case, this code picks wrong device.
loop = "xxxxx 123456789 xxxxx"
instance['name']  = "123"
title: wrong name match in destroy_container

comments.content:
The name matching is wrong in destroy_container
https://github.com/openstack/nova/blob/master/nova/virt/disk.py#L194

In this case, this code picks wrong device.
loop = "xxxxx 123456789 xxxxx"
instance['name']  = "123"
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~nati-ueno

comments.content: That file no longer exists in the tree, and this area looks to have been significantly refactored. It is probably worth revalidating whether or not this is still a bug.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~sdague

comments.content:
As pointed out above this bug no longer exists in Folsom (code has been refactored).

This could still happen in Diablo though... for which we can backport a fix.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~dan-prince

comments.content: Nominated for Diablo in case someone wants to backport a fix.  Marked as Invalid (not a bug) for master.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~russellb
